com.excilys.computerdb.mapper

Interface ComputerMapper


  • public interface ComputerMapper
    Implemented interface that allow you to map options for Computer ( Resultset -> Model, DTO -> Model, Model -> DTo, ...)
    Author:
    Steven Fougeron

    • Field Summary

      static org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER
